include.condition: !Skin.String(MenuDesign) | Skin.String(MenuDesign,0) | Skin.String(MenuDesign,1) | Skin.String(MenuDesign,7) | Skin.String(MenuDesign,2) | Skin.String(MenuDesign,3) | Skin.String(MenuDesign,6)

control.visible: System.GetBool(lookandfeel.enablerssfeeds) + [ [!Skin.String(RSSIdleTime) | Skin.String(RSSIdleTime,0)] | Skin.String(RSSIdleTime,3) + System.IdleTime(3) | Skin.String(RSSIdleTime,5) + System.IdleTime(5) | Skin.String(RSSIdleTime,7) + System.IdleTime(7) | Skin.String(RSSIdleTime,10) + System.IdleTime(10) | Skin.String(RSSIdleTime,15) + System.IdleTime(15) | Skin.String(RSSIdleTime,20) + System.IdleTime(20) | Skin.String(RSSIdleTime,25) + System.IdleTime(25) | Window.IsVisible(Home.xml)]
